text: Mohammad Mushfiqur Rahim () (born 1 September 1988) is a Bangladeshi cricketer and the captain of his national team. He made his Test debut in 2005, at the age of 16. Rahim trained at the Bangladesh Institute of Sports. At the next year he made his ODI debut. At the end of 2011 he was given the captain of his national side. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mushfiqur Rahim from ESPNcricinfo * Mushfiqur Rahim from CricketArchive Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:People from Rajshahi Division
title: Mushfiqur Rahim
